EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger's Repertoire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For every level of Fatesinger, gain 2 Songs, +10 Melee Power, +3 sonic resistance and 25 Spell Points. If you didn't have "Bardic Ballad" gain that feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Glitter of Fame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level, +1 Charisma, +1 Constitution and a +1 to hit. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, you radiate confidence: gain a +1 to all other Ability scores, except Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Harmonic Resonance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee, missile, and unarmed attacks have a 10% chance per hit of building a stacking resonance in your enemies. Each stack increases the creature's vulnerability to Sonic damage by 10%. The effect may stack up to 5 times and lasts up to 20 seconds. You also gain +1 effective Arcane caster level. (Active) You may expend a Song to activate Harmonic Resonance. If you do so, your voice thrums with magic, and you no longer require material components to cast spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Intoxicating Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level and a +1 to hit. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, enemies that strike you have a 5% chance of becoming Fascinated for 12 seconds, with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grandeur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, you project an Aura of Grandeur. This aura grants you a +1 to all saving throws, a +2 to all Charisma-based skills and a +3 Unique bonus to damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Majesty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to your effective Arcane caster level and a +1 to hit. You also gain a +5 to all saving throws vs. Enchantments and a +10 to the Spell Power of your Sonic, Light and Positive spells. Special Effect: Enemies that strike you also have a 5% chance to become blinded by your glory for 12 seconds (in addition to other effects), with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: O Fortuna
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to Inspire Courage: You and your party gain +[1/2/3] to saves vs. fear. In addition, you personally gain a +[1/2/3] to your Fortitude and Reflex saves (morale bonus, does not stack with Heroism)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Allure
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/6/9 Universal Spell Power from Inspire Courage, +2/4/6 to Perform, Haggle, and Bluff. +1/2/3 Song(s)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Music of the Spider Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Fascinate: Your Fascinate gains the power to mesmerize Vermin. Mesmerized Vermin stop acting and behave like they have been fascinated. Unlike truly fascinated creatures, however, they are not susceptible to suggestion.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Dirge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend a song to produce a haunting funeral march. You deal 10d[4/6/8] Negative damage and 10d[8/10/12] Sonic damage every 3 seconds for 18 seconds (fort save for half). In addition, enemies may be slowed by 5% if they fail their fort save. Duration 18 seconds (modified by enhancements that increase song duration).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Tailwind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Inspire Courage: You and your party gain an additional +[0/0/1] damage from Inspire Couraget, and you an additional +[1/2/3] competence bonus to damage for all missile weapons (damage stacks with other competence bonuses!).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Lucidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +0/0/1 Attack from Inspire Courage, +2/4/6 Concentration/Diplomacy, +1/2/3 UMD, +1 Song.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masked Ball
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fascinate or Dirge grants you and your allies [+10/+20] to Jump and Tumble (enhancement bonus), [+0/+1] charisma, and the ability to run over slippery surfaces (duration: 4 minutes). In the confusion, you open up a brief window of opportunity, granting your party a +2 bonus to hit when Sneak Attacking, and an additional [+0/+1d6] Sneak Attack die (duration: 10 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fastesinger: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Siren's Song
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spontaneous song: Unbreakable mesmerize on a single target and deals 2 Constitution damage every [3/2/1] seconds. Duration 12 seconds. (Active Cooldown: [60/50/40] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Reign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spontaneous Song (expends a song but instant activation): You gain a +[20/40/60] temporary Health. On a vorpal strike, you unleash a thunderclap for [7/9/11]d20 Sonic and [7/9/11]d20 Electrical damage. Procs on melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks. Duration: 5 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Aria
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: All your songs gain [30/60/90] Seconds to their duration. Active: Spontaneous Song (expends a song but instant activation): You generate [15%/25%/35%] less threat for spellcasting. In addition, you gain a [20/40/60] Spell Power bonus to your Sonic spells, and a [5/10/15] Spell Power bonus to your Force, Positive and Negative spells. Duration: 5 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Arcane
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance: Grants you either Draconic Incarnation: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 Natural Armor and a +2 to your saves vs. Poison. You also gain an additional 9 Spell Power to Acid, Cold, Electric, and Fire spells. Finally, you gain a +20% bonus to the duration of your Songs. Magister: Gain a +1 Intelligence, a +1 to Use Magic Device, a +4 Concentration, a +2 Spell Penetration bonus to your spells, a +2 to the DC's of your offensive wands. Finally, you gain a 1 minute bonus to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Draconic Incarnation
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 Natural Armor and a +2 to your saves vs. Poison. You also gain an additional 9 Spell Power to Acid, Cold, Electric, and Fire spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Magister
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Intelligence, a +1 to Use Magic Device, a +4 Concentration, a +2 Spell Penetration bonus to your spells, a +2 to the DC's of your offensive wands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Chord of Disruption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When Siren's Song expires, Chord of Disruption focuses your energy to a single disruptive point causing [5d100+700 / 6d100+800 / 7d100+900] disintegrating sonic damage. If a Fortitude save is made effects are halved.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Echoes of the Ancestors: Martial
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance, 1 song to activate: either Grandmaster of Flowers: Gain a +1 Wisdom, a +2 AC while Tumbling and a +1 to all saving throws. You gain a +2 to your Concentration, a +2 to Balance and a 2% Dodge bonus. Lastly, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +2 to saves vs. Fear. Legendary Dreadnought: Gain a +1 Strength, +10 to your maximum health, +1 to the DCs of all combat feats, +1 to Hit, 1 Extra Action boost per rest. In addition your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to Hit and +1 to Damage. Shadowdancer: Gain a +1 Dexterity, a +2 to saving throws vs. traps and a 1d6 Sneak Attack damage bonus. In addition, every time you are hit, you have a 5% chance of being affected by Lingering Shadows for 4 seconds. Lingering Shadows grants you displacement, a +4 to hit and +2 damage, and +15% attack speed, but is removed if you are damaged. Lastly, you gain a +20% to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Grandmaster of Flowers
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Wisdom, a +2 AC while Tumbling and a +1 to all saving throws. You gain a +2 to your Concentration, a +2 to Balance and a 2% Dodge bonus. Lastly, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +2 to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Legendary Dreadnought
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Strength, +10 to your maximum health, +1 to the DCs of all combat feats, +1 to Hit, 1 Extra Action boost per rest. In addition your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to Hit and +1 to Damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Shadowdancer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Dexterity, a +2 to saving throws vs. traps and a 1d6 Sneak Attack damage bonus. In addition, every time you are hit, you have a 5% chance of being affected by Lingering Shadows for 4 seconds. Lingering Shadows grants you displacement, a +4 to hit and +2 damage, and +15% attack speed, but is removed if you are damaged. Lastly, you gain 1 minute to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Divine
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: (-1 song) (Passive, Cooldown 6 seconds) Stance, 1 song to activate: Either Divine Crusader: Gain +1 Strength, +2 Sacred bonus to Seeker, +5 HP, +1 Turn Undead, +20% bonus to song duration. Exalted Angel: Gain +1 Charisma, +3 Jump, a +4 to Fortitude saves vs. Disease, and +25 Spell Power when casting Positive Energy spells. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 save vs. fear. Unyielding Sentinel: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 to all saving throws, a 2/- DR bonus to blocking, and a +1 to hit. Your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 to saves vs. Fear. If you possess an Aura of Good, that grants an additional +1 bonus to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Divine Crusader
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +1 Strength, +2 Sacred bonus to Seeker, +5 HP, +1 Turn Undead, +1 minute bonus to song duration.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Exalted Angel
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +1 Charisma, +3 Jump, a +4 to Fortitude saves vs. Disease, and +25 Spell Power when casting Positive Energy spells. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 save vs. fear.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Unyielding Sentinel
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 to all saving throws, a 2/- DR bonus to blocking, and a +1 to hit. Your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 to saves vs. Fear. If you possess an Aura of Good, that grants an additional +1 bonus to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Primal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: (-1 song) (Passive, Cooldown 6 seconds) Stance, 1 song to activate: Either Fury of the Wild: Gain a +1 Constitution and +25 to your maximum Health and a +2 to all Fortitude saves. If you have Rage feat, your Rage grants you an additional +1 Strength while raging. You also have a +3% chance to trigger weapon effects on glancing blows. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage and +1 to your saves vs Fear. Primal Avatar: Gain a +1 Wisdom. Gain a +6 Spell Power to Fire, Cold, Electricity, Acid and Rust, as well as a +5 resistance to Fire, Cold and Electricity. Lastly, you gain a +20% to the duration of your Songs. Shiradi Champion: Gain a +1 Dexterity, +5 Spot, +2 Listen and 2 Diplomacy. Your attack speed with bows and thrown weapons is 10% faster. Finally, you gain a +20% bonus to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Fury of the Wild
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Constitution and +25 to your maximum Health and a +2 to all Fortitude saves. If you have Rage feat, your Rage grants you an additional +1 Strength while raging. You also have a +3% chance to trigger weapon effects on glancing blows. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage and +1 to your saves vs Fear.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Primal Avatar
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Wisdom. Gain a +6 Spell Power to Fire, Cold, Electricity, Acid and Rust, as well as a +5 resistance to Fire, Cold and Electricity. Lastly, you gain a +1 minute to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Shiradi Champion
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 to all saving throws, a 2/- DR bonus to blocking, and a +1 to hit. Your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 to saves vs. Fear. If you possess an Aura of Good, that grants an additional +1 bonus to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Bound Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A single target must make a Will save with a DC modified by the caster's Charisma modifier. On a failed save, the target is bound briefly to the spot, and for one minute is also [6/10/12]% more vulnerable to magical damage, and has -[6/10/12] Spell Resistance. In addition, the creature deals -[4/6/8] damage on attacks. Duration 45 seconds. Instant cast.(Active Cooldown: 4mins)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fragment of the Song: Clarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: All of your Songs gain [30/60] seconds to their duration. Additionally, your Inspire Courage grants additional effects only for you: Rank 1: Your spells cost 5% less SP, +3 Concentration and +20 temporary SP. (Competence) Rank 2: Your spells cost 5% less SP, +3 Concentration and +20 temporary SP. (Moral)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masquerade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can switch your Twist of Fate at a Rest Shrine.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fragment of the Song: Valor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inspire Courage grants you and your party an additional [+1/+2] to damage. In addition, you gain the following personal bonuses: Rank 1: Inspire Courage increases your melee attack speed by +3% (competence bonus, stacks with Haste spell) and grants you +10 competence bonus to temporary HP. Removes combat penalties for moving. Rank 2: +1 to hit, +10 morale bonus to temporary HP, +2 to Intimidate (Morale bonus). Gives you a 2% chance to cause 5% electric/light/sonic vulnerability (stacks 3 times).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grim Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Bound Fate now inflicts creatures with an additional [6%/10%/12%] vulnerability to Physical attacks. Grim Fate may take effect even if Bound Fate does not. Duration 1 minute.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Turn of the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spontaneous Song (expend a song to activate). Turn of the Tide grants a full BAB, +3 to hit, +40% damage, DR 15/-, a +4 Charisma, and deals +5d10 +75 Sonic damage and +5d10 +75 Light damage per hit. (This magical damage does not affect Bosses.) While under the effects of Turn of the Tide, rolling a 1 on a Will save is not an automatic failure. Duration: 45 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma
